text: Netoto efwe khwalonjela omulilo kwa Jahannam abaanji Mumajini nende Abandu. Bali nende emioyo halali shibachikhonyelanga okhumanya tawe, Bali nende tsimoni halali shibalolelanga tawe, bali nende amarwi halali shibakawulilanga tawe, abo bali shinga tsisolo, halali abo nababii muno, abo nibo abakoyana
